about_the_game:
Adult Education is a provocative visual novel set within the intimate confines of an adult evening school, where traditional classroom rules are left at the door. The story follows a sultry and enigmatic teacher who begins to develop a secret, passionate interest in her female students. As the lessons progress, so do the teacher's desires, sparking forbidden relationships that blend education with seduction. The game delves deep into themes of power dynamics, illicit attraction, and sensual exploration, with each encounter pushing the boundaries of what is acceptable between teacher and student.

In this story, the teacher's desires aren't the only ones at play. The students, too, have their own passions and pleasures, often seeking out forbidden trysts in the secluded corners of the school library and hidden nooks of the restroom. These moments of lust unfold in secret, turning the school into a backdrop for heated, illicit encounters.

As the lines between education and desire blur, players are immersed in a passionate journey that offers a combination of erotic storytelling, captivating characters, and provocative scenes.

  • Explicit Adult Scenes: Experience detailed and uncensored erotic moments, crafted for mature players.

  • High-Quality Illustrations: Stunning, hand-drawn visuals that bring each encounter and character to life.

  • Diverse Settings: Explore intimate scenarios in various school locations, including the library and restroom.

  • Mature Themes: Delve into forbidden attraction, power dynamics, and sensual exploration, all within the context of adult education.

  • Atmospheric Soundtrack: An immersive score that sets the tone for every passionate encounter.

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: Adult Education contains adult content. It features sexual themes, erotic scenes, nudity, sexual acts. It does not contain drug abuse, self-harm, or suicide. Recommended for players aged 18 and above.

The developer holds full and exclusive rights to commercially utilize the aforementioned artworks provided by the artist, within the context of creating and distributing this game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Adult Education

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
